shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the local user does not receive the data stream from the remote user.

p.codeblock: public void onStreamMessageError(int uid, int streamId, int error, int missed, int cached) {}

virtual void onStreamMessageError(IChannel *rtcChannel, uid_t uid, int streamId, int code, int missed, int cached) { (void)rtcChannel; (void)uid; (void)streamId; (void)code; (void)missed; (void)cached; }
on( evt: EngineEvents.STREAM_MESSAGE_ERROR, cb: ( uid: number, streamId: number, code: number, missed: number, cached: number ) => void ): this;

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the local user fails to receive the stream message that the remote user sends by calling the method.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user sending the message.
Stream ID of the received message.
The error code. See Error Codes and Warning Codes.
Number of incoming cached messages when the data stream is interrupted.
